verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when Adoni-zedek <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H3920>captured<s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and had <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> it <S%H9201>(just<s%> as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and its <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and its <S%H4428>king<s%>), and that the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> had <S%H7999>made<s%> <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and were <S%H7130>within<s%> their <S%H7130>land,<s%>

that he <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> [was] a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> like <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4467>royal<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> it was <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H376>men<s%> [were] <S%H1368>mighty.<s%>

Therefore Adoni-zedek <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> [word] to <S%H1944>Hoham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> and to <S%H6502>Piram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%> and to <S%H3309>Japhia<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> and to <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5927>"Come<s%> up to me and <S%H5826>help<s%> me, and let us <S%H5221>attack<s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> for it has <S%H7999>made<s%> <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

So the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> [and] the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> together and <S%H5927>went<s%> up, they with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4264>armies,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> by <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> [word] to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Do not <S%H7503>abandon<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H4480><s%> your <S%H5650>servants;<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> up to us <S%H4120>quickly<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> us and <S%H5826>help<s%> us, for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> that <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> have <S%H6908>assembled<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> us."

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with him and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1368>warriors.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "Do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> them, for I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> not <S%H376>one<s%> of them shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you."
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> upon them <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> by <S%H5927>marching<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2000>confounded<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and He <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of Beth-horon, and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5825>Azekah<s%> and <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as they <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> [while] they were at the <S%H4174>descent<s%> of Beth-horon, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7993>threw<s%> <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> on them as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> and they <S%H4191>died;<s%> [there were] <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> from the <S%H1259>hailstones<s%> <S%H68><s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> those <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> up the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "O <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H1826>stand<s%> <S%H1826>still<s%> at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> And O <S%H3394>moon<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H357>Aijalon.<s%>"

So the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H1826>stood<s%> <S%H1826>still,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H5975>stopped,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H5358>avenged<s%> themselves of their <S%H340>enemies.<s%> Is it not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H3477>Jashar<s%>? And the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5975>stopped<s%> in the <S%H2677>middle<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and did not <S%H213>hasten<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> [down] for about a <S%H8549>whole<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> like that <S%H6440>before<s%> it or <S%H310>after<s%> it, when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H376>man;<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>
Now <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> had <S%H5127>fled<s%> and <S%H2244>hidden<s%> themselves in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> have been <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2244>hidden<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>"

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1556>"Roll<s%> <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H6485>assign<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> by it to <S%H8104>guard<s%> them,

but do not <S%H5975>stay<s%> [there] <S%H9043>yourselves;<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> and <S%H2179>attack<s%> them in the <S%H2179>rear.<s%> Do not <S%H5414>allow<s%> them to <S%H935>enter<s%> their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> "

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H5221>slaying<s%> them with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>destroyed,<s%> and the <S%H8300>survivors<s%> [who] <S%H8277>remained<s%> of them had <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%>

that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> one <S%H2782>uttered<s%> a <S%H3956>word<s%> against any of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6605>"Open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> out to me from the <S%H4631>cave.<s%>"

And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> out to him from the <S%H4631>cave:<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> [and] the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when they <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> out to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7101>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> who had <S%H1980>gone<s%> with him, <S%H7126>"Come<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> on the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%>" So they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%> on their <S%H6677>necks.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> then <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> or be <S%H2865>dismayed!<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> for <S%H3602>thus<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H3898>fight.<s%>"

So <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> them and <S%H4191>put<s%> them to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> them on <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H6086>trees;<s%> and they <S%H8518>hung<s%> on the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at <S%H8121>sunset<s%> <S%H935><s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and they <S%H3381>took<s%> them <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H7993>threw<s%> them into the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had <S%H2244>hidden<s%> themselves, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave,<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>captured<s%> <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it and its <S%H4428>king<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> he <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> it and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was in it. He <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor.<s%> Thus he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him <S%H5674>passed<s%> on from <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> to <S%H3841>Libnah,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it <S%H1571>also<s%> with its <S%H4428>king<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> it and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [was] in it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> He <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor<s%> in it. Thus he <S%H6213>did<s%> to its <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him <S%H5674>passed<s%> on from <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> to <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and they <S%H2583>camped<s%> by it and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against it.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H3920>captured<s%> it on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [was] in it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H2036>Horam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>defeated<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he had <S%H7604>left<s%> him <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him <S%H5674>passed<s%> on from <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> to <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> and they <S%H2583>camped<s%> by it and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

And they <S%H3920>captured<s%> it on that <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and he <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [was] in it, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3923>Lachish.<s%>
Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

And they <S%H3920>captured<s%> it and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it and its <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] in it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> He <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5700>Eglon.<s%> And he <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> it and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [was] in it.
Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H1688>Debir,<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

And he <S%H3920>captured<s%> it and its <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> [who was] in it. He <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor.<s%> <S%H9201>Just<s%> as he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H1688>Debir<s%> and its <S%H4428>king,<s%> as he had also <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> and its <S%H4428>king.<s%>
